__Descriptions__._notes: The only required value is feature, all the result will fall back to defaults
__Descriptions__._combinefeatures: [boolean] Whether the template allows multiple of the same feature to be combined
__Descriptions__._singlefeature: [boolean] If the template only works with a single feature
__Descriptions__._template: Base template format, available substitutions: ${params} (template params), ${mtype} (last feature type), ${features} (features)
__Descriptions__._params: Format for template params, available substitutions: ${name}, ${value} (pairs for mapID, plane and zoom)
__Descriptions__._feature: Base feature format, available substitutions: ${coords} (feature coordinates), ${properties} (feature properties), ${type} (feature type), ${n} (feature number, starting at 1)
__Descriptions__._coords: Format for coordinates, available substitutions: ${x}/${lon} (x coordinate), ${y}/${lat} (y coordinate), ${p}/${plane} (plane, if available)
__Descriptions__._coordsSeparator2: Separator between coordinate groups (eg polygons with holes or combined features)
__Descriptions__._featProps: Base format for feature properties, available substitutions: ${name} (name of property/simple style), ${value}, ${n} (feature number)
